text: Yabonani! Sathabatha uMnqophiso wenu, Saphakamisa intaba yaqonga phezu kwenu (Sathi): “Bambelelani nkqi koko Sininike kona niphulaphule (kuThi).” Bathi bona, “Sivile asathobela”, neentliziyo zabo zabe zizele kukunqula ithole ngenxa yokungabi nalukholo kwabo. Yithi: “Ikukungcola into eniyiyalelwa lukholo lwenu ukuba niyakholwa.”
